  "title": "IT Assistant",
  "description": "Primly Premium Solutions Limited (PPS) is a technology Solution Company established in Nigeria to provide innovative solutions to basic issues that occur in everyday life. Our goal is simple - using technology to solve societal problems.

We are a fun and energetic team with a culture of excellence. At PPS, we understand it takes a team to thrive - Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships. We are expanding our team and looking for talented and passionate individuals. We design web applications and database solutions and offer consultancy services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Summary


	PPS is seeking a trainable IT Assistant to provide administrative and first-level technical support to team members.


Job Description
Office Assistance:


	Assist team members with organizing files, scanning documents, making photocopies, and scheduling meetings.
	Process orders for equipment, including sourcing vendors, obtaining invoices, and processing requests.
	Collect and receive orders from vendors, distribute orders to various centers, and run other errands as needed.
	Perform clerical and administrative tasks to support the IT Team.
	Record information in databases and generate reports and documents.
	Assist with the configuration and connection of peripheral equipment (e.g., printers, monitors, scanners) to computer systems.
	Provide basic equipment support across centers, including setup, troubleshooting, and cleaning of hardware.
	Perform routine checks on CCTV systems, attendance scanners, walkie-talkies, and other IT gadgets to ensure proper functionality.
	Run daily website downtime tests and generate monthly reports to track performance.


Basic IT Support &amp; Troubleshooting:


	Assist in the installation and configuration of Windows operating systems and software applications, ensuring systems are up-to-date.
	Troubleshoot and resolve basic hardware and software issues, escalating to senior IT staff when necessary.


Application Testing:


	Test and retest multiple web and mobile applications.
	Identify bugs, software defects, and inconsistencies.
	Record bugs, glitches, and other flaws identified during testing.
	Create and regularly update logs to document testing phases and defects.


Other:


	Record and log all interactions (queries, incidents, and resolutions) in relevant logs.
	Create and maintain reports using Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel, analyzing data and tracking IT-related performance metrics.
	Maintain a database of all equipment (Computers, Keyboards, Wireless Adapters, Routers, etc.).
	Performs miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Diploma or equivalent in a relevant field.
	IT certifications (e.g., CompTIA, Microsoft) are an advantage.
	Experience with CCTV installation and maintenance.
	Ability to perform basic laptop repairs (e.g., replacing hard drives, system setup).
	Proficient in Microsoft Excel, including the use of formulas.
	Ability to deliver basic training to staff.
	Familiar with office equipment like printers, scanners, and copiers.
	Minimum typing speed of 45 words per minute.
	Strong communication skills (verbal and written).
	Ability to handle confidential information.
	Physically able to lift equipment and work in various postures.
	Can manage high-pressure situations and pay attention to detail.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CVs (PDF Format) to:&nbsp;jobs@primlypremiumsolutions.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Sotware Engineer",
  "description": "Apex Network is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Sotware Engineer in Test (SDET)

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria

About the job


	As a Senior QA Engineer, you will champion quality across our distributed systems. Partnering with engineering (Golang, Laravel), frontend (VueJS), and API teams, you&#39;ll design and execute test strategies, build automation frameworks, and ensure our micro-services ecosystem meets reliability and performance standards.


Requirements


	Develop and maintain comprehensive test plans: functional, regression, integration, API, and UI
	Design, implement, and scale automated test frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Postman, or equivalent)
	Collaborate with developers to define testable acceptance criteria and improve testability
	Execute manual and automated test suites, analyze results, and report defects
	Perform performance, load, and stress testing on microservices and APIs
	Establish and monitor quality metrics (e.g., test coverage, defect rates, MTTR)
	Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins)
	Mentor junior QA engineers and drive best practices in test automation and quality engineering


Qualifications


	5+ years of QA experience in software engineering environments
	Strong proficiency in test automation tools and frameworks for API and UI testing
	Experience testing microservices architectures and RESTful/gRPC APIs
	Familiarity with Golang and Laravel codebases&mdash;able to write basic test scripts or helpers
	Hands?on experience with frontend testing in VueJS applications
	Solid understanding of CI/CD pipelines and integrating test suites
	Skilled in defect tracking tools (Jira, GitHub Issues) and version control (Git)
	Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail
	Strong communication and collaboration mindset.


Stand-out qualities:


	Background in fintech or e?commerce platforms
	Knowledge of performance testing tools (k6, JMeter, Locust)
	Experience with containerized testing environments (Docker)
	Familiarity with monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
	Security testing experience (SAST/DAST tools).


Benefits


	Competitive salary and equity options
	Flexible working hours and remote?first culture
	Comprehensive health insurance package
